com.radaee.pdfex

Interface PDFView.PDFAnnotListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    PDFView

    public static interface PDFView.PDFAnnotListener
    Interface for annotation operations listener.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAnnotComboBox(int sel, java.lang.String[] opts, float left, float top, float right, float bottom)
      fired when combo-box is clicked
      void onAnnotDragStart(boolean has_act, boolean has_popup)
      fired when an annotation is selected.
      void onAnnotEditBox(int type, java.lang.String val, float text_size, float left, float top, float right, float bottom)
      fired when an edit-box is clicked.
      void onAnnotEnd()
      fired when an annotation is unselected.
      void onAnnotUpdate()
      fired when an annotation is updated in memory.

    • Method Detail

      • onAnnotEditBox

        void onAnnotEditBox(int type,
                  java.lang.String val,
                  float text_size,
                  float left,
                  float top,
                  float right,
                  float bottom)
        fired when an edit-box is clicked.
        Parameters:
        type -
        0: single line edit-box.
        1: password edit-box.
        2: MultiLine edit-box.
        val - current value of edit-box.
        text_size - text size.
        left - left coordinate in view
        top - top coordinate in view
        right - right coordinate in view
        bottom - bottom coordinate in view

      • onAnnotComboBox

        void onAnnotComboBox(int sel,
                   java.lang.String[] opts,
                   float left,
                   float top,
                   float right,
                   float bottom)
        fired when combo-box is clicked
        Parameters:
        sel - 0 based, current select item of combo-box.
        opts - all items in combo-box
        left - left coordinate in view
        top - top coordinate in view
        right - right coordinate in view
        bottom - bottom coordinate in view

      • onAnnotDragStart

        void onAnnotDragStart(boolean has_act,
                    boolean has_popup)
        fired when an annotation is selected.
        Parameters:
        has_act - is selected annotation has action that PDF library support?
        has_popup - is selected annotation has popup window to edit text note?
        if has_popup = true:
        can get note text by PDFView.annotGetText, and get title by PDFView.annotGetSubject.
        and set note text by PDFView.annotSetText, and get title by PDFView.annotSetSubject.

      • onAnnotEnd

        void onAnnotEnd()
        fired when an annotation is unselected.

      • onAnnotUpdate

        void onAnnotUpdate()
        fired when an annotation is updated in memory.
